input.sentences: we took a trip to the ocean .
grandpa took the kids in the little boat .
they dangled their feet off the dock .
the boys posed for a picture .
output.sentences: We went on a sail boat on the ocean.
My grandma watched us from shore.
Grandpa was with us on the boat.
When we came back we dangled our feet from the dock.
Dad posed for a picture with grandpa.
